title: Rewards (Part 2)
body:
Rewards (Part 2)

The door of the room was opened once again, and twenty one people entered the room.

Among the five teachers who were present in the room earlier, only two teachers came here while the other three went back to do their own things.

Since the exam was already over there was no need for all of them to come here, just to announce the results.

But since the people of the guilds wanted to recruit the students all nineteen of them came here.

The two teachers who came into the room were Wyatt and Edward, followed by Issac, Jeffrey, Olivia, and other people from the guilds.

The eyes of most of the students were fixed on the people of guilds.

All of the people who came from the guilds were well known people so most of the students recognized them.

"That is Issac from the silver star guild, even silver star guild is recruiting," a student said after seeing Issac.
